UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Structure-activity relationship studies of gomesin: importance of the disulfide bridges for conformation, bioactivities, and serum stability.
Literature.Author: Fázio MA, Oliveira VX Jr, Bulet P, Miranda MT, Daffre S, Miranda A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=>81.92µM),Escherichia coli SBS 363(MIC=20.48-40.96µM),Candida albicans MDM8(MIC=2.56-5.12µM)
